Class MusicCollection

  • java.lang.Object
    • MusicCollection
  • public class MusicCollection
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to hold details of audio files. It use Music Class to add new musics to list.
    Since:
    2020-03-17 ArrayList Iterator

        public void startPlaying​(int index)
        Start playing a file in the collection. Use stopPlaying() to stop it playing. check if index is valid.
        Parameters:
        index - The index of the file to be played.
